content.text: Select a Tower for more information

"Terrorists have invaded the country! 
Defeat the terrorists and survive the attack!"
This is the normal ability of the tower. It does something to help you win the game.
This is the upgraded ability of the tower. It does something to help you win the game.

parameters: "Welcome, Guardian of Singapore! Before you set out to defend our country, you must know how to do so."

events.comment: Change music according to comm support

parameters:
"Tensions are getting high! Place down Community
Leaders near all grouped towers!"

events.comment: Add Comm Support if Community Leader has Upgrade

parameters: "Cheerleaders boost morale among citizens, and keeps the country motivated to move on."
"Caring citizens give a listening ear to those in need and will help them if necessary."
"Leaders are able to solve problems within a community, effectively and efficiently."
"Career Guiders help lead people into suitable jobs that the country needs."
"Investors help fund new companies and support existing local businesses."
"Soldiers are the first line of defence against physical threats to Singapore."
"Intelligence helps detect and deter threats before they can be executed."
"Not only do Firefighters fight fire, they also help out in many other aspects as well."
"Doctors treat health conditions to help the community live better."
"White-hat hackers have good intentions, and prevent their bad counterparts from doing damage."
"Dicerning Citizens tell lies from truth online and take appropriate responses against them."

events.comment: Set appropritate Crisis title and info

parameters:
"Your towers have been hacked by unidentified cybercriminals, reducing their range!
Beware of the internet trolls and defeat them before they slow your towers down!"

"Terrorists have invaded the country! 
Defeat the terrorists and survive the attack!"

"The economy is falling and money is running tight!
The next 3 waves will not give any money!"
"Your towers have been infected with a viral plague, reducing their fire rate! Cure them with Doctors!"
"Your towers have stopped trusting each other! For the next 3 waves, bonuses provided by towers are removed! (except Community Leader)"
"Some of your soldiers have sabotaged your Towers and refuse to fire for the next 3 waves!"
"Boosts fire rate of towers in range."
"Further boosts fire rate, and boosts damage as well."
"Must be placed onto another tower. It will then copy the type of tower it is placed on, but with half its original fire rate."
"Increases the maximum number of towers that can be placed by 4. Can be placed even if there is not enough tower slots."
"Further increases the maximum number of towers by 2."
"Bullets now deal slightly more damage and can pierce through up to three enemies."
"Spawns puddles on the path that permanently stuns a single enemy that steps on it."
"Firefighter will now sometimes fire a huge water droplet that tracks enemies and also stuns enemies near the target."
"Fires large signals at the enemies which slow them down for a while."
"Prevents nearby towers from being targeted by negative status effects. Does not cure pre-existing status effects."
"Caring Citizen can now recruit up to two Self-radicalised Individuals that hang around after they are defeated to become Soldiers."
"Towers placed close together may cause a community riot. Place a Community Leader near them to prevent this."
"Range of Community Leader increases. Additionally, produces one Community Support every 8 rounds."
"Towers placed in range have a 20% discount."
"Towers placed in range now have an 25% discount and do not increase prices of that type of tower."
"Spawns barricades on the path that deal moderate damage to enemies that collide with it."
"Increases maximum number of barricades on the map at once, and rate of barricade spawning."
"Cures all towers on map of negative status effects one by one."
"Enemies in range of this tower can be targetted by any tower on the map."
"Welcome, Guardian of Singapore! Before you set out to defend our country, you must know how to do so."
"You are not alone. The Total Defence Towers of Defence have offered their help in defending the city."
"You are not alone. The Total Defence Towers of Defence have offered their help in defending the city."
"Oh no, an enemy is spawning! Quick, click on the Shop tab ($) and recruit a Soldier!"
"Click the buy button, then drag the green spawnbox to set the spawn location of the Soldier, then click the Confirm button. The circle around the spawnbox represents the Tower's range."
"The Soldier will automatically attack the enemy Terrorist, as long as it is in range!"

"The enemy Terrorist has been killed!
On the top of the screen you'll see you have 5 Community Support points. Each time an enemy gets to the base you lose 1 point. If an enemy reaches your base at 0 points, you lose!"
"Oh no, you failed to kill the enemy terrorist! Try again!"

"The enemy Terrorist has been killed!
On the top of the screen you'll see you have 5 Community Support points. Each time an enemy gets to the base you lose 1 point. If an enemy reaches your base at 0 points, you lose!"
"If you look at the top left corner, you'll see we've run out of Towers! Luckily, you can buy the Career Guider to increase your Tower cap!"
"If you look at the top left corner, you'll see we've run out of Towers! Luckily, you can buy the Career Guider to increase your Tower cap!"
"Career Guider can be found under the yellow Economic tab. Place it anywhere you like!"

"Now you can recruit more Soldiers to assist you in the fight!
There are many more Towers that you can recruit after this tutorial. Check out what they do by clicking the icons that represent the individual towers!"
"Towers can also be upgraded to improve their abilities, but for a price! Upgrade any tower by clicking on them and clicking the green upgrade button."
"Towers can also be upgraded to improve their abilities, but for a price! Upgrade any tower by clicking on them and clicking the green upgrade button."

"Great! Now you know how to make your towers stronger!
You can also check out what upgraded Towers do by clicking on the tower's icon in the shop!"

"Great! Now you know how to make your towers stronger!
You can also check out what upgraded Towers do by clicking on the tower's icon in the shop!"
"Towers can also be boosted by other towers! For instance, having a Cheerleader near your towers will boost their fire rate! Buy a Cheerleader from the shop and place it near a Soldier."
"Towers can also be boosted by other towers! For instance, having a Cheerleader near your towers will boost their fire rate! Buy a Cheerleader from the shop and place it near a Soldier."
"Cheerleader can be found under the red Psychological tab. Remember to place it in range of the Soldier!"
"Cheerleader can be found under the red Psychological tab. Remember to place it in range of the Soldier!"

"Great! Notice the red particles surrounding the Soldier? This means that the Cheerleader boost is active. Beware of negative effects, too! If black effects surround your Tower, that means its fire rate has been reduced!"

"Great! Notice the red particles surrounding the Soldier? This means that the Cheerleader boost is active. Beware of negative effects, too! If black effects surround your Tower, that means its fire rate has been reduced!"
"Now upgrade your Cheerleader to increase the fire rate boost even more!"
"Now upgrade your Cheerleader to increase the fire rate boost even more!"

"Great! Notice the colour of the particles? They're now pink to show that the Soldier is being boosted by an upgraded Cheerleader!
You can see what effects certain towers give by clicking on the tower's shop icon as well."

"You're all set! Defend against the remaining enemies to complete the tutorial!
One more thing: Crises are randomly occuring events that spawn a horde of enemies at you. Make sure you're prepared for them!"

"Great! Notice the colour of the particles? They're now pink to show that the Soldier is being boosted by an upgraded Cheerleader!
You can see what effects certain towers give by clicking on the tower's shop icon as well."

"You're all set! Defend against the remaining enemies to complete the tutorial!
One more thing: Crises are randomly occuring events that spawn a horde of enemies at you. Make sure you're prepared for them!"
"Oh no, you failed to kill the enemy terrorist! Try again!"
